avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: Versatile avatar component with network, asset, initials fallback, and optional status indicator

dependencies.message: Theme configuration is required. Make sure you have run 'fluttercn init' first.

avatar.usageExample:
import 'package:your_app/widgets/common/avatar.dart';

Avatar(
  imageUrl: 'https://example.com/avatar.jpg',
  fallbackName: 'Ada Lovelace',
  size: AvatarSize.lg,
  showStatus: true,
)

AvatarGroup(
  avatars: [
    Avatar(fallbackName: 'John Doe'),
    Avatar(fallbackName: 'Jane Smith'),
    Avatar(fallbackName: 'Alice Bob'),
  ],
  max: 3,
)

toggle.name: toggle
toggle.description: Animated on/off switch with labels, descriptions, error state, and customizable sizes

dependencies.message: Theme configuration is required. Make sure you have run 'fluttercn init' first.

toggle.usageExample:
import 'package:your_app/widgets/common/toggle.dart';

Toggle(
  value: darkMode,
  label: 'Dark mode',
  description: 'Switch to the dark color scheme',
  onChanged: (value) => setState(() => darkMode = value),
)

Toggle(
  value: acceptTerms,
  label: 'Accept terms and conditions',
  error: showError,
  errorText: showError ? 'Required to continue' : null,
  onChanged: (value) => setState(() => acceptTerms = value),
)
